title: Huevos Rancheros
directions: Mince onion and chop garlic and let sit for 5 minutes to bring out their health-promoting benefits.

In a separate stainless steel skillet, saut√© onion over medium heat for about 3 minutes stirring frequently, until translucent. Add garlic, beans, red chili powder and cumin. Warm beans while eggs are poaching, stirring occasionally. Add cilantro, salt, and pepper.
Place eggs next to beans. Garnish eggs with salsa, cheese and avocado.
ingredients: salt and black pepper to taste
